page.title: For Our Students, For Cincinnati's Future
page.description: 3 Ways to Invest in a student's education to shape Cincinnati's future.

intro.paragraphs:
There's a story unfolding at UC, and every one of us who calls Greater Cincinnati home has a stake in what happens next.

Bucking trends in higher education, UC is growing—and alongside it, so does our commitment to students. With 50,000 students and a rapidly changing world, UC is accelerating our work to ensure each student succeeds.

Why? Because we know that a college degree is the best tool for generational change. And a UC degree is the best path to launch a career of meaning and impact.

Under a broad, university-wide vision, we are creating new scholarships and recruitment programs, adding student-centered resources, and elevating career readiness tools to empower the next generation of leaders.

items.text: An opportunity for every student who wants to earn a UC degree, free from financial barriers.
A community where each Bearcat feels like they belong—and has the tools to thrive.
A path to success that sets UC apart as the launching place for tomorrow's leaders and change-makers.

blockquote.html:
When students succeed at the University of Cincinnati, their achievements extend far beyond our classrooms and campus. Our students and alumni are of enormous value in today’s diverse, technology-infused, knowledge-driven economy.



UC’s commitment to student success is a call-to-action for all of us who want to make a pledge to lift up families, employers and communities across Greater Cincinnati for generations to come.

Neville G. Pinto, PhD
President
University of Cincinnati

whyNow.heading: Why Now?
whyNow.paragraphs:
Higher education is changing

Across the nation, colleges and universities recognize that true student success requires an immersive support environment and a comprehensive focus on students inside and outside the classroom.

Student needs are evolving

Each generation of students faces a new set of challenges. Today’s students are navigating increasing costs, expectations and complexities to succeed not only in their academic careers, but to set themselves apart in a competitive professional environment.

UC is growing

As we celebrate our entrance into the Big 12, we are rising to the call of our new, national stage. And through the tremendous support garnered throughout the Next, Now campaign, we have aligned programs and resources across colleges to lay the groundwork for this breakthrough.

studentFuture.heading: For our Students, For our Future
studentFuture.paragraphs: In a rapidly changing world, UC stands out as a public university that is growing, thriving and doubling down on our commitment to the value of higher education.
